name: Dicevania
description:
Dicevania

My submission for GMTK  Game Jam 2022

You are a dice in search of the great crystal. You need to collect force orbs to overcome the challenges ahead.

Controls:

  • Use WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Use mouse to rotate camera
  • Use numpad numbers (num lock enabled) or the numbers on top of alphabetical keys to use force orbs
  • Use Escape to pause/unpause
  • Press R to get back to the last area you were on sand (Soft Reset)
  • Hold R to get back to a fixed predefined location (Hard Reset)
